sub_title: Interim Lead Spatial Planning and Environment & Strategic Community Management South of the Netherlands (Ruimtelijke Ordening en Milieu & Strategisch Omgevingsmanagement)
summary:
I am passionate about innovation. Proven successful in translating ideas to business impact, building new propositions and revenue models, searching for partners and introducing new services to the market. Strong focus on people, new technologies and consumer insights.
 
As an interim manager I have had the opportunity to pick up many challenges in multiple organisations in different sectors - Health insurance, Telecommunications, Cable industry, Utilities, Financial Services, Automotive and Public Transportation. I have built and managed many teams and as an open minded and energetic team player I successfully steer innovations and help to grow companies. Lean Start up approach.

Key words: innovation, strategy, energy transition, transformation, start-ups, growth hacking, partner marketing, business development, contract negotiation, agile, lean start up approach, minimal viable product, change.
